nodes.text: The Concordian mines were a series of mines constructed on Concordia, the moon of the planet Mandalore. They were largely believed to be abandoned until Obi-Wan discovered Death Watch's presence there in 21 BBY Obi-Wan was captured by Mandalorian warriors during his investigation of the mines. However, Satine helped him escape. Obi-Wan then discovered Pre Vizsla was the leader of Death Watch and dueled him before escaping with Satine.
